faq.title: Have questions?
faq.description: Here are answers to the most frequently asked questions about LTB Bank services

questions.question: How do daily interest rates work?
questions.answer: Interest is calculated daily based on your account balance. Instead of paying interest once a year, we pay it daily. This means your money grows every day, not just at the end of the year.

questions.question: Do I really not need to provide any reports?
questions.answer: Yes, we don't need income declarations, employment certificates or other complex documents. Simply open an account and start saving. We believe that saving should be simple and accessible to everyone.

questions.question: How safe is my money?
questions.answer: Your deposits are insured according to EU directives up to €100,000 per client. We use the highest level encryption technologies and maintain strict security protocols. Your data is confidential and not disclosed to anyone.

questions.question: Can I withdraw money anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, your money is available anytime. There are no lock-up periods or penalties for early withdrawals. You can withdraw the full amount or just a part - you decide.

questions.question: What are the fees?
questions.answer: We don't charge any fees for account management, transfers or storage. The only fee you pay is the standard state income tax on earned interest.

questions.question: What's the minimum amount needed to start?
questions.answer: The minimum deposit amount is only €100. There are no maximum limits, however deposits exceeding €100,000 are not insured under EU directives.

questions.question: How quickly do I receive interest?
questions.answer: Interest is calculated and added to your account daily. You can see your balance grow every day in our mobile app or online banking.

questions.question: What happens if you go bankrupt?
questions.answer: LTB Bank is a licensed bank, supervised by the Bank of Lithuania. Our operations are regulated according to EU directives, and deposits are insured up to €100,000 per client. Your money is safe.
